gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 142, Pacers 132
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Pacers, 142-132 to snap a four-game losing streak . The Heat outscored the Pacers, 45-32 in the final frame as they shot 15-18 in the quarter overall. Jimmy Butler led the Heat with 36 points, 10 rebounds, and three assists as Jaime Jacquez Jr. added a career-high 24 points, along with five rebounds. Tyrese Haliburton led the Pacers with a career-high 44 points and 10 assists as Obi Toppin added 25 points. The Heat move to 11-8 as the Pacers move to 9-8 on the year.
